headline: Motorola Solutions Brings Drone Dispatch to APX NEXT Radios, Advancing Officer Safety
summary: CHICAGO, October 15, 2025--Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) today announced a significant advancement for Drone as First Responder (DFR) programs with the ability to dispatch a drone when an officer signals an emergency on their APX NEXT smart radio. The company’s technology integrations with BRINC and SkySafe, strategic alliances announced earlier this year, accelerate aerial intelligence for first responders in the field while providing the command center with comprehensive drone detection capab

headline: Interoperable Defense Tech Unveiled at AUSA Could Be a Game Changer for Motorola Solutions (MSI)
summary: At AUSA 2025, Motorola Solutions showcased advancements in defense technology, including mesh networking radios, unified command centers, long-range thermal cameras, AI-driven drone solutions, and integrations with partners like Nokia and SkySafe. These demonstrations highlight Motorola Solutions’ expanded presence in secure, data-driven defense technologies designed for modern, mission-critical operations across multiple domains. We’ll explore how the unveiling of interoperable mission...
